short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click as many Coins as you can to UNLOCK the Golden Elephant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Clicker Mania" is an immersive browser game where your mission is to click your way through various levels of excitement and achievement, all while encountering adorable elephants. The game challenges players to click on a dynamic image to earn points and progress through multiple levels, unlocking achievements along the way.

Features:

Click Mechanic: Click on the main image to earn points.
Progress Bar: Track your progress with a dynamic bar.
Achievements: Unlock special achievements by reaching specific milestones.
Level System: Progress through levels, each requiring a set number of clicks to advance.
Visual Feedback: Enjoy responsive visual changes with each click and achievement unlock.
Background Customization: Customize your game environment with personalized backgrounds.
Elephant Encounters:

Encounter adorable elephants throughout the game as part of the enchanting visuals and narrative.
Interact with elephants that may appear at various milestones or achievements, adding charm to your gameplay experience.
Levels:

The game features multiple levels, each offering a progressively challenging experience.
Levels are structured to test your clicking speed and endurance as you strive to reach higher milestones.
Achievements:

Earn achievements by reaching significant click milestones (e.g., 100 clicks, 200 clicks).
Each achievement unlocks visually rewarding content and adds to the game's sense of accomplishment.
